en.tagline: Take a free city tour around Salvador!
en.description1: When you are within a radius of 100 meters away from some of the main Salvador's sights, an audio with informative and cultural content about the place will be available on the app.
en.description2: The City Tour Mobile project has the aim of spread cultural and informative content about sights of Salvador through guided tours in audio format. In this first stage, you can listen to sound narratives about 11 attractions: Antiga Faculdade de Medicina, Centro Cultural Solar Ferrão, Terreiro de Jesus, Igreja de São Francisco, Catedral Basílica, Farol da Barra, Ponta do Humaitá, Mercado Modelo, Igreja do Bonfim, Lagoa do Abaeté and Arena Fonte Nova.
en.description3: This project was funded by the Brazilian Ministry of Culture through the public notice "Concurso Cultura 2014" with the name Mapa Sonoro Ssa for cultural action during the World Cup in Brazil.
en.features130: Updates audio of 5 sights and improvements on the interface
en.features120: Internationalization of the interface and fixes error in audio player
en.contact-text: Contact us or report bugs in the app.
en.compatible1: Compatible with iPhone and iPad. Requires iOS 6.0 or higher and GPS access.
en.compatible2: Compatible with Android 2.3.3 or higher. Only requires GPS access.
